# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product holds great value to me due to its unique features and quality craftsmanship. I am offering it to you for $150, which reflects its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you. Considering its exceptional quality and functionality, I believe this is an excellent opportunity for you to experience the best. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in making a purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
